item.title: First contribution to Bootstrap
item.author: hello@aentan.com (AenTan)
item.description: Mark Otto merged my first pull request into Bootstrap. Just some additional CSS to add previously unsupported button dropdowns to justified button groups. Here’s a demo. If you are using Bootstrap > v3.0.3 it has five lines of my code in it!
